mapper.select: SELECT P.ORD_NUM, P.PAY_DATE,J.USER_ID,P.PAY_TOAL,J.ORD_STATUS,P.PAY_METHOD,P.PAY_MSG FROM PAYMENT P JOIN JUMUN J ON (P.ORD_NUM= J.ORD_NUM) JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (J.ORD_NUM=OP.ORD_NUM) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (OP.STO_NUM=SI.STO_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND P.PAY_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND P.PAY_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) AND J.ORD_STATUS LIKE '%배달%'

SELECT J.ORD_NUM, LISTAGG(CAST(M.MENU_NAME AS VARCHAR(1000)),',')WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY M.MENU_NAME) AS REAL_MENU FROM JUMUN_DETAIL J JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON(J.STO_NUM=SI.STO_NUM) JOIN MENU M ON (J.MENU_NUM=M.MENU_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} GROUP BY J.ORD_NUM ORDER BY J.ORD_NUM
